item.title: Degree Distribution
item.description: Degree Distribution # We present the degree distribution of the network. Here is the in-degree distribution: And here is the out-degree distribution: How about that, Ganon?

item.title: Most Connected Nodes
item.description: Most Connected Nodes # Below we plot the most connected nodes, both with regard to in- and out-degree: Here is the 50 highest in-degree nodes: And here is the 50 highest out-degree nodes: How about that, Ganon?
